mapper.select: SELECT et.id exerciseTypeId,et.exercise_type,et.exercise_name, et.description,ec.id exerciseContentId, ec.exercise_content,ec.answer_analysis,ec.exercise_answer_picture, ec.optionss,ec.right_answer,ec.score,ec.exercise_content_picture FROM exercise_type et,exercise_content ec WHERE et.id = ec.exercise_type_id AND ec.section_id = #{sectionId} ORDER BY et.seq,ec.seq,ec.create_date
